forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. Southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the night deepens in Downtown San Francisco, a soft blanket of clouds weaves itself over the city, shrouding the familiar skyline in a moody embrace. The temperature hovers around a gentle 56 degrees, punctuated by the whisper of a southwest breeze. This calm nocturnal scene gives way to a promising morning, when dawn will unfold into a tapestry of mostly sunny skies, brightening the surroundings to a comfortable high of 67 degrees. The air will carry a briskness, with winds swirling at a pace that encourages a stroll through the streets, beckoning those who relish the vibrant pulse of city life.

An eye on the horizon reveals the faint vestiges of a marine layer, teasing the edge of the Golden Gate, a reminder of the embrace of the Bay's atmospheric quirks. Yet, as the day progresses, expect that fog to retreat, gifting clarity and warmth to those seeking outdoor solace. Dressing in layers would be prudent—perhaps a light sweater or jacket, easily shed as the sun ascends to its peak. Whether sipping coffee at a favorite café or meandering through the lush expanse of Golden Gate Park, today offers a canvas ideal for quiet adventures amidst the charm of urbanity, celebrating the effortless allure that defines this iconic locale.
